attributes.action: Removal of automatic consent for DVLA to sell Data to private companies
attributes.additional_details: We, the below signed, wish to petition the Government to remove the 'presumed automatic right' which allows DVLA and other Govt. depts to sell data regarding identification of individuals to non-Governmental organisations, and replace it with new legislation requiring Government bodies (such as DVLA) to require the express written permission of each individual person for whom a data request by a non-Government organisation has been made.
